安裝:

2.將punt.jar 放落.minecraft/mods

好像沒有合成

shift下船

replies.author: wsdnmtoo1
replies.txt_content: 船里都进水了  我会乱说

replies.author: Youlink
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Youlink 于 2012-12-18 10:57 编辑 

Build recipe is three standard boats across the bottom (should work now)

作者说配方是三个原版木盆船在低下放成一排
另外操作方式是右键上船，上船后右键开箱子，shift＋右键下船

For now, during testing:Build recipe is three standard boats across the bottom (should work now)In creative mode, Punt appears on the Misc tab Transportation tabDestroying a Punt gives you back a Punt (plus contents of chest)The Punt is VERY HARD to damage


作者还提到在创造模式物品中，帆船被归在运输（和矿车是一样的）这一类
摧毁帆船将得到帆船和你装在箱子里的物品
帆船非！常！难！摧毁


然后就是需要forge，把jar扔进mod目录下安装
话说卤煮给的下载是个zip？
